Html:
While parsing an 856 I noticed that the HL validation in OopFactory.X12.Parsing.X12Parser.ParseMultiple fails to validate the initial HL with a parent id of 0

I changed line 166 to 
                        if (parentId != "" && parentId!="0")
from
                        if (parentId != "")
This works as I would expect but I wonder if this will cause issues with other documents.
